reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 249/20: EXTENSION OF INSTALMENT DUE DATES

content.content: 1. For the 2020 calendar year, the time for paying the following instalments under subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act is extended as follows:  1.  With respect to the instalment referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act, on or before September 30, 2020. 2.  With respect to the instalment referred to in paragraph 3 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act, on or before December 31, 2020.
content.raw_html:
1. For the 2020 calendar year, the time for paying the following instalments under subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act is extended as follows:

1.  With respect to the instalment referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act, on or before September 30, 2020.

2.  With respect to the instalment referred to in paragraph 3 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act, on or before December 31, 2020.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
